      • installPackage

        public void installPackage(java.io.File applicationDirectory,
                           PackageInfo packageInfo)
                    throws InstallPackageServiceException
        Description copied from interface: InstallPackageService
        Install a package in a concrete gvSIG installation directory. The selected package has to be contained in one of the bundles that has been previously added using the #addBundle(File) or the #addBundlesFromDirectory(File) method.
        Specified by:
        installPackage in interface InstallPackageService
        Parameters:
        applicationDirectory - a valid root directory where an instance og gvSIG is installed.
        packageInfo - the package to install.
        Throws:
        InstallPackageServiceException - If there is an error installing the package.

        Specified by:
        installPackage in interface InstallPackageService
        Parameters:
        applicationDirectory - a valid root directory where an instance og gvSIG is installed.
        packageCode - the code of the package.
        Throws:
        InstallPackageServiceException - if there is an error installing the PackageInfo#

        public PackageInfo getPackageInfo(int index)
        Description copied from interface: InstallPackageService

        Specified by:

      • addBundle

        public void addBundle(java.io.File bundle,
                      SimpleTaskStatus taskStatus)
               throws InstallPackageServiceException
        Description copied from interface: InstallPackageService
        Adds a the URI of a bundle that contains some packages to install. A bundle is a compressed zip file with a structure defined in the InstallerManager class.
        Specified by:
        addBundle in interface InstallPackageService
        Throws:
        InstallPackageServiceException - it is thrown if there is an exception reading the URI.

      • addBundle

        Throws:

      • addBundlesFromDirectory

        public void addBundlesFromDirectory(java.io.File directory,
                                    SimpleTaskStatus taskStatus)
                             throws InstallPackageServiceException
        Description copied from interface: InstallPackageService
        In reads a directory and reads all the bundles. This method retrieve all the information of the packages located in the bundles and allows to the user to show this information.
        Specified by:
        addBundlesFromDirectory in interface InstallPackageService
        Parameters:
        directory - a directory that contains bundles.
        Throws:
        InstallPackageServiceException - If there is any problem reading the directory of bundles.
